page.title: 17Weston Turville Village Hall
page.content: Many events take place in and around the village hall.One of them is the playscheme which provides entertainment for young children during the school holidays.An afternoon enjoying many activities like painting, pottery,and badge making is provided for just a small sum of money. Jumble sales are also very popular in the village hall.They usually last for the whole day raising a large sum of money for charity.While the jumble sale takes place you can have your car washed for 60p in the car park. When a car boot sale takes place you can have your own stall for twenty pounds.All the profit goes to the charity of your own choice. The village hall can also be rented for parties or clubs.At one stage these were very popular.
